thread.title: Taj 51 buckhingam gate. London
thread.title_full: Taj 51 buckhingam gate. London - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Vishesh A
title: Taj 51 buckhingam gate. London
text: One of the most decent properties to stay. Rooms are of good size unlike most UK hotels and have a good size washrooms as well. The service is the best and the food is awesome. The courtyard is not found everywhere buzzing with activities like people sitting gossiping have tea drinks kids playing. The spa and wellness centre is superb. Each member of staff takes care of your needs personally whether from any department. All together the best residences suites and room property in London.
